description:
Ichigo and Rukia set out in search of Ichigo`s body which has taken over by a mod soul.  Ichigo finds it at an elementary school, but the Other Ichigo has become too strong and gets away.  In the midst of battle, Rukia receives a word through her Soul Cell Phone of a Hollow sighting, but the battery dies and she is unable to confirm its location.  And the Other Ichigo, who has run away, senses a Hollow stalking a grade school student.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ぬいぐるみからコンにちは
